What our leaders say

DAVID SMOOKE

FOUNDER/CEO
Please treat your internet friends with respect. There are many places on the internet where you can be mean. This is not one of them. You are welcome to be anonymous. You are welcome to speak your truth. Within reason. When agreeing or disagreeing, please be thoughtful, respectful and kind.

LINH DAO SMOOKE

COO
Tech is basically electricity right now. It's everywhere; it's with everything that we do. So if you have a story that is related to tech we always and only judge the story on its own merit. It doesn't matter if you've never published with us before.

DANE LYONS

CPO
We inhabit a world riddled with problems. We face social injustice, totalitarian oppression, microplastics tainting our water, global warming, AI uncertainty, security risks, wealth inequality, and a wide range of other bumps in the road. As a technologist, I believe tech has the potential to help us overcome every challenge. It's not easy, but we can come together to share ideas and invent solutions.

NATASHA NEL

MANAGING EDITOR
Hacker Noon is best place for tech professionals to publish online. Not only do you get mad street credits from our global audience of discerning technologists, but you also get access to (free) premium editorial support from our team of human editors, as well as getting your published work promoted via Hacker Noon's many social media platforms. Go on, tell us your tech story today!
